Q: Hi my sister has quite a few lumps in between her tighs plus one under her arm she is a little overweight however I do not think it is related to that !? Ive googled this and it came up with the possibility of a cyst or early signs of breast cancer. Would that be accurate or are there many more possibilities ???
A: Brief answer LymphadopathyDetailed answerLooking at history it seems to be a case of either Lymphadenopathy or Lipoma would like further details to help you better prehistory of fever distribution of lumps, size and consistency of lumps if it is Lymphadenopathy without prior incidence of infection, it could be due to a metastasis of any neoplasm (cancer)Hope this helps outranks for using our Steve a nice day
